item.title: All the Cool Science Fiction is From the 80s
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Guardians of the Galaxy is hot shit, Piranha Games takes money and makes a new game, Matt tries Star Citizen, and WB announces a digital distribution platform; we discuss old school sci-fi, space operas, and the Mass Effect trilogy (spoilers!).
